name: create-ui-app-cli
description: CLI tool to create React apps with popular UI libraries

scripts.make-dist: if not exist dist mkdir dist
scripts.build: npm run make-dist && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/cli.js && node scripts/fix-shebang.js && npm run copy-presets
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm uninstall -g create-ui-app-cli && npm link
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
